question: Which of the following was rewarded with the office of shaikh ul Islam by Iltutmish?
explanation: Qutbuddin Bakhtiyar Kaki came to Delhi where he was warmly welcomed and extended patronage by Iltutmish. Iltutmish offered Qutbuddin Bakhtiyar Kaki a rewarding office of shaikh ul Islam,Â  which he turned down.
